content: CARACAS  June 19 The International Centre for Settlement of Investment Disputes (ICSID) has dismissed a proposal by Venezuela to disqualify  arbitrators handling a case brought by Owens-Illinois.
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: Venezuela motion in Owens-Illinois case dismissed by arbitration group

content: Owens-Illinois Inc   which makes bottles for Corona and Pepsi  is to buy Mexico's Vitro SAB's glass container business for about $2.15 billion to strengthen its operations in a country that houses numerous distilleries and bottlers.
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: Owens-Illinois to buy Mexico's Vitro's glass container business

content: * O-I shares rise 10.7 pct  Vitro hits record high   (Updates with Vitro share price)
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: UPDATE 3-Owens-Illinois to buy Mexico's Vitro's glass container business

content: May 13 Glass container maker Owens-Illinois Inc  said it would buy Mexican glass maker Vitro SAB de CV's  food and beverage glass container business for about $2.15 billion.
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: Owens-Illinois to buy Vitro's food  beverage glass business

content: CARACAS  March 12 Venezuela is likely to seek the annulment of a World Bank tribunal award that orders it pay U.S. bottle maker Owens-Illinois $455 million in compensation for nationalization  a lawyer for the South American country said on Thursday.
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: Venezuela likely to seek annulment in $455 mln Owens-Illinois award-lawyer

content: CARACAS  March 13 Venezuela said on Friday it has started the process of filing for the annulment of an award that orders the South American country to pay U.S. bottle maker Owens-Illinois $455 million in compensation for nationalizations.
name: Owens-Illinois Inc
title: Venezuela confirms to file for annulment of $455 mln Owens-Illinois award
